name: Who to Haunt?
description:
Your name is Henrietta. You're 87. You just died.

On any other day, it would be time to move on. But you lucked out. Today is Halloween.

Before passing on to whatever it is that comes next, the lucky few who die on Halloween get the chance to do something very special.

A haunting.

But you only get one, so you must choose wisely.

Make your choice, Henrietta...

***

This Twine game is the joint winner of Ectocomp 2017 in La Petite Mort category for games made in under 3 hours. Speedwriting this was a lot of fun, so I hope you enjoy it too!

I'd love to know what you think, so please do leave comments or questions below.
